Detailed Description

Perspective calibration.

This class describe a perspective calibration. You need this calibration when your logical coordination system is flat, but not orthogonal to camera axis. Please note, that logical coordination system represents only finite rectangle area, you can set using SetBounds(const i2d::CRectangle&) method.

virtual bool iview::CPerspectiveCalibration::GetDistance ( const i2d::CVector2d &  origPos1,
const i2d::CVector2d &  origPos2,
double &  result,
ExactnessMode  mode = EM_NONE 
) const [virtual]

Compute a shorteness distance in transformed coordinations.

Parameters:
origPos1first position in original coordinates.
origPos2second position in original coordinates.
resultobject where result distance between positions in transformed coordinates will be stored.
modecontrols needed transformation exactness.
Returns:
true, if calculation done correctly.
